import matches from'./matches';/**
 * Returns the closest parent element that matches a given selector.
 * 
 * @param node the reference element
 * @param selector the selector to match
 * @param stopAt stop traversing when this element is found
 */export default function closest(node,selector,stopAt){if(node.closest&&!stopAt)node.closest(selector);var nextNode=node;do{if(matches(nextNode,selector))return nextNode;nextNode=nextNode.parentElement;}while(nextNode&&nextNode!==stopAt&&nextNode.nodeType===document.ELEMENT_NODE);return null;}
